Instruction: Mix all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, wheat cereal mix, salt, and yeast together in a large bowl. Pour in the water and stir until thoroughly combined. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and allow the dough to rest at room temperature for 12 to 18 hours.
Knead the dough gently to shape into a smooth ball. Place the dough into a bread pan and allow it to rest for another 2 to 4 hours.
Preheat oven to a very hot temperature of 425°F (220°C). Make a shallow cut about 1/2 inch deep on the top of the dough.
Bake for about 45 minutes in the preheated oven, until the top turns golden brown.
You have already placed the dough in the prepared loaf pan at step 2. Just bake the dough in the preheated oven at 425 degrees F for a great loaf of bread.
